程序包 draw3

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Client
    class Client use to handle the drawing player's socket data
    CopyOfDrawMain
    The class CopyOfDrawMain is the main frame of the drawing game.
    DrawMain  
    Info
    The class Info is used to generate a random words and show it in the info panel
    MultiThreadServer
    The class MultiThreadServer is used to handle the data receiving from the drawing player and change the current view
    PenModel
    The class PenModel is used to save all the model data, including the pen's size, color, position and the actual as well as the guessing words
    penView
    The class penView is to change the view once the model is changed
    penViewController
    The penViewController is the core part of the game, it connects to the model and all the performances
    ShowMessage  
    StillClock  
    Tool
    The class tool is to handle the button action
    ToolMove  
    Words
    class Words use to obtain player's input and judge whether it is equal to the actual words
